text: The planned Sydney Metro network as intended to appear in 2024. Sydney Metro is the brand name for rapid transit service in Sydney, New South Wales. The first section of the network, the North West line, opened in 2019. The City & Southwest extension to this line is under construction, with the Western and Western Sydney Airport lines are in the planning stage. __TOC__ ==Current== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:90%;" !
